## CarouselViewProps.orientation property

Place the tiles vertically or horizontally next to each other. If undefined orientation is guessed by the dimensions of the container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
orientation?: 'vertical' | 'horizontal';
```

{% usage name="orientation" package="@livekit/components-react" exampleCount=0 /%}
